channel.title: CVE Feed for LAN Messenger -- LAN Messenger
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LAN Messenger -- LAN Messenger

item.title: CVE-2024-4599|2024-08-01T20:47:41.238Z -- lan%20messenger -- lan%20messenger
item.description: Remote denial of service vulnerability in LAN Messenger affecting version 3.4.0. This vulnerability allows an attacker to crash the LAN Messenger service by sending a long string directly and continuously over the UDP protocol.

item.title: CVE-2024-4599|2024-06-04T17:53:15.765Z -- lan%20messenger -- lan%20messenger
item.description: Remote denial of service vulnerability in LAN Messenger affecting version 3.4.0. This vulnerability allows an attacker to crash the LAN Messenger service by sending a long string directly and continuously over the UDP protocol.
